description: Web event fired when a user clicks a page link.

articleId.description: The article ID the link was clicked on.

category.description: What category of event is it

isInstapage.description: Indicates if the event originated from InstaPage.

isThisMoment.description: Indicates if the event originated from ThisMoment.

linkLocation.description: Where the link was located on the page.

linkName.description: The name of the link as it appears on the page.

location.description: Where the event fired on our application.

pageName.description: The screen that the event takes place on (web only)

path.description: The path portion of the page URL.

perk.description: The name of the Premium Perk.

spotId.description: The spot ID the link was clicked on.

spotName.description: The spot name the link was clicked on.

subscriptionEntitlement.description: The subscription entitlement of user if known, otherwise null.

url.description: The full URL of the page.
